comments:
Test Driver:TPTP-4.2.0-200604101029 

Steps:

1. Create a new plugin in your workbench named "logAnalyzerTest" which imports "org.eclipse.hyades.analysis.engine"
2. Create an empty implementation of the interface org.eclipse.hyades.analysis.engine.ILogAnalyzer named LogAnalyzerTest
3.  Now run the workbench containing the new plugin and create a "Log Analyzer sample"  from the menu File->New->Example->Hyades Logging->Apache Log Correlation/Analyzer Sample.
4. Verify that the Apache error log provided  by the sample was analyzed and in the log view on the Analysis Results tab the following result is displayed 

"File does not exist
File does not exist:
Try reinstalling the apache server.
Contact your local administrator."

result:

An exception is thrown. Please see attached .log file for more details.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-04-10 14:51:25.266
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.sample.loganalyzer.LogAnalyzerCreationWizard.correlateAccessLog(LogAnalyzerCreationWizard.java:159)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.sample.loganalyzer.LogAnalyzerCreationWizard.finishWork(LogAnalyzerCreationWizard.java:260)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.ui.internal.wizard.exampleproject.CreationWizard.performFinish(CreationWizard.java:414)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.finishPressed(WizardDialog.java:680)
I cannot reproduce the problem with tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.2.0-200604110100
I cannot reproduce it either with TPTP-4.2.0-200604101029.

reproduceable on the latest driver

Not a shtop ship for i2 , moving to i3
Sorry, I cannot seem to reproduce this problem with my workbench environment and also with TPTP4.2 Callisto. I am returning this defect for now. Reopen it if you can still reproduce it.
